usage.cn: 要做得比你的竞争对手少： 但别回避你的产品和服务做得少的事实, 把它做到醒目, 并以此为荣。 ——《Rework》
usage.eng: Underdo your competition. Don't shy away from the fact that your product or service does less. Highlight it. Be proud of it.

usage.cn: 生命并不是一场竞赛。而是一段旅程。如果你在途中一直都试图给他人留下深刻印象，超过别人，那你就浪费了这段旅程。
usage.eng: Life isn't a competition. It's a journey. If you spend that journey always trying to impress others, to outdo others, you're wasting your journey.
